item.description:
Back by popular demand!!

Bring your "burning questions" re: how to live a jOYful, fulfilling life using LOA and other Universal Laws. We'll breakout into smaller groups to mastermind and contemplate, using our group wisdom to arrive at solutions, suggestions etc...

Of cos, the best part, as a community, we are each other's Believing Eyes - how powerful!. So, join us to mastermind, support and inspire each other.

Paula Parnagian, gifted facilitator and BostonLOA member, has graciously agreed to guide us once again to get what we need from the discussions as a group and individually. We'll have other seasoned members facilitate the smaller group discussions.

*****************************************************************
About Paula Parnagian:
www.WorldViewServices.net
to contact Paula: PParnagian@WorldViewServices.net

Paula is the founder and President of World View Services, an organizational consulting firm specializing in diversity, conflict and change. Paula is a speaker, trainer, consultant, and author who has a passion for creating peaceful and prosperous environments, helping her clients get over it so that they can get on with it!

***************************************************************
RSVP "YES" ONLY if you know you are coming.
We usually provide handouts and have appetizers & refreshments. So, to keep "green" & cost down, please RSVP "Yes" only when you can honor your commitment & show up. Many of you have been wonderful with this and we very much appreciate your understanding and support!

**************************************************************
For parking and directions (via T or driving) info to Dave's loft :
(1)Go here: http://lawofattractio...
(2) Sign in
(3) Scroll down and open file "Directions & Parking_BostonLOA Meetup"

group.name: The Boston Law of Attraction Meetup Group

item.name: Group Wisdom: Mastermind with Each Other
